About.profile:
Born April 17, 2000

From Nerima-ku, Tokyo



Second-year master's student in Information Engineering at Chuo University Graduate School.

I have a bit of experience in backend and frontend development.



During my undergraduate years, I was passionate about team-based game development.

My research focuses on the field of medical engineering.



Hobbies: Karaoke, Valorant, Hiking (beginner)

Qualifications: Applied Information Technology Engineer Exam
